This technique is a variation of [[Tsukuyomi]], a high-level [[genjutsu]]. The user transforms the Tsukuyomi into a barrier that slows the opponent down. This does not happen physically but rather mentally. It makes the opponent think they are being held back by a barrier. While using this technique, Itachi's health and chakra slowly drain. 

==Trivia==
* In ''[[Naruto: Ultimate Ninja Heroes]]'', Itachi used this technique without any health drawbacks or range-limits.
